job description:
Responsibilities:
  • Ensure at a high level of accuracy the quality of daily and monthly analytics for securities and alternative asset classes such as a mortgage loans and derivatives. (i.e. duration, weighted avg. live, yield, etc...)
  • Support security pricing functions as required for daily and month end processes.
  • Work closely with the Point of Contact for analytics and keeping them apprised of status on issues and projects.
  • Complete thorough research on behalf of Data Management and propose appropriate solutions.
  • Understand and be able to speak to multiple domains of data (i.e. Security, Benchmark, Analytics, and Pricing).
  • Perform business analysis to determine best practices within daily production/projects.
  • Continuous improvement mindset, improving data quality with a focus on customer service.
  • Participate and set high expectations of self on daily production and projects.
  • Provide excellent customer service to all clients and internal customers.
Required Qualifications:
  • Bachelor's degree in Finance or related fields.
  • 3+ years of related experience in financial services industry or technical analysis
  • Proven ability to collaborate with a variety of internal and external parties to understand customer needs and ensure positive outcomes for our clients.
  • Process improvement experience preferred, with the ability to recognize opportunities within own role.
  • Strong analytical, problem recognition and resolution, and communication skills.
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple assignments.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Working knowledge of fixed income products and investment processes preferred.
  • Experience with Aladdin desired
  • Strong Excel skills
  • CFA Level 1 passed
Job and compensation levels depend upon an applicant's qualifications including the extent of his/her relevant experience and other job related factors and will be determined by hiring supervisors/managers and HR.
